content: भ्रमणं [भ्रम्-ल्युट्] {@--1@} Moving or roving about, roaming about. {@--2@} Turning round, revolution. {@--3@} Deviation, swerving. {@--4@} Shaking, tottering, unsteadiness, staggering. {@--5@} Erring. {@--6@} Giddiness, dizziness. {@--7@} A tour, excursion. {@--8@} The orbit of a planet. --णी {@--1@} A kind of game. {@--2@} A leech.
